body.p: These pages provide help on setting up your computer and your server login to make it easier to work on Oracc projects.

dl.dd: Setting up your user on your own machine(s); presently only for MacOS
Setting up your server login (for projects, this is the project basename excluding any subproject appendages).
Setting up your Github UserID to be able to work directly on repositories.

body.p: After having followed these steps you should be able to log in to the server without being prompted for your password, edit files with Emacs via Tramp, again without being prompted for a password, and carry out github commands in the project on the server from within Emacs using M-!.
